sn48.13:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.13:4.6: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re a non-returner … a once-returner … a stream enterer … a follower of principle … a follower by faith.
sn48.13:4.7: So from a diversity of faculties there’s a diversity of fruits. And from a diversity of fruits there’s a diversity of persons.”
